Html:
I am using Club starter kit 2 and classified web sites, together and they are working great.

The problem I have is going directly to the Classified pages when you click the link on the link bar.

When you click the link button it takes you to the for_sale.asp page.
Then you have to click another link to go Classified pages.

Is there a code that I can put on the For_sale.aspx  or create a For_sale. aspx.vb page with it
or some place else that goes directly to Classified pages and skips opening the for_sale.asp?

thank you lhr

This discussion is closed.
I figured out the code to redirect the page when you click the link.

LHR
